title: Anymore off meta builds that work.
body:
Something fun maybe in a new lane that works well at least half the time. Just tried on hit TF 4-2 in ranked but its silver so everything works. 

Oh and no KBVTV builds tried some most dont work.

replies.body: jungle karthus i love it so much

{{champion:57}} support. it makes the enemy support leave bot lane and the enemy jungler fear bot lane jungle
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Support {{champion:80}}. Bonus points if you go AP and still carry.

{{champion:53}}  mid.

build tank and counter your lane opponent. watch your teams jungler and judge the amount of damage being put out on their buff. then use that info to steal blue buff at the last second with your Q from the bush that sits next to the wall.

DO AP RAKAN MID {{item:3152}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3115}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3285}}  you can throw in a {{item:1082}}  if your getting ahead it lets you snowball easier you can easily kill adcs that don't build mr or lots of health
Laning Yi is hilarious if you practice Alpha dodging enough.
